module.name: fpg_form
module.short: This unit contains the class implementation representing a Form/Window on the screen

element.name: TWindowPosition.wpUser
element.short: OS or Desktop/Window manager decides the position.

element.name: TWindowPosition.wpAuto
element.short: Window gets placed in exact x,y coordinates set by developer.

element.name: TWindowPosition.wpScreenCenter
element.short: Window gets centered horizontally and vertically in the current desktop window.

element.name: TWindowPosition.wpOneThirdDown
element.short: Following the "golden ratio 1.618" rules or ideas as to what is pleasing to the eye. The window is positioned one third from the top of the screen, using the desktop height to calculate, and centered horizontally.
